tooltips: How far and by what methods passengers travel in the Nigeria
By 2060 the average annual distance travelled per person is 194% further than in 2015. 70% of this is done by car.
By 2060 the average annual distance travelled per person is 162% further than in 2015. 58.2% of this is done by car.
By 2060 the average annual distance travelled per person is 129% further than in 2015. 51.2% of this is done by car.
By 2060 the average annual distance travelled per person is 96% further than in 2015. 40% of this is done by car.
